title: Do I get RP if I do the tutorial or hit lvl 3?
body: My friends said they got free RP for hitting lvl 3 but i never got any? Did they remove it?

replies.body:
The 400 RP promotion has ended and we've changed it to a Hextech Chest and Key when you hit level 5. This change was made a while ago, and should give you an opportunity to become familiar with the Hextech Crafting system if you haven't already used it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
They changed it so you now get 2 premium chests and a key
